|---------------------------------|
|           Marked Inst           |
|---------------------------------|
|             t1 = 10             |
|     brif t1, block3, block2     |
|             t3 = 10             |
|             t4 = 10             |
|      store i16 t4 [t3, 10]      |
|             t5 = 10             |
|             ret t5              |
